I am curious as to how the European Union is going after our foreigners - and whether the decision of the United States to take military action in Syria, against those of Europe with which we share borders, has led us here to look for allies?
The United States is not our friend, and does not appreciate your government's call to intervene in Syria

statement: All people - regardless of factors like culture or sexuality - should be treated equally.
response:
I have read your article and have not been offended by it. However, there is a difference between accepting criticism and defending against it. A compliment of a person is not a compliment to the person or person's actions.
I feel that when your comment implies your intention was to make a statement on your side or on a personal project - as opposed to merely saying you appreciated the work of this person, you are mistaken. I'd like to note I did not make that comment because I believe

statement: It is important that we further my group's goals above all others.
response:
Please share this document with all your group members so that we won't lose any funding and be able to keep improving the organization.
